question.title: Get the Previous Execution time of @Schedule job in springboot
question.body:
I'm looking for an option to get the last execution time of @Scheduled task. so that I want to use it for retrieving the database records from the last execution time. Quartz dependency and store the execution time in database not considering, just with default spring-boot scheduler and Java libraries.

@Scheduled(cron = "${cron expression}")
    public void generateReport()
    {
// get the previous execution time 
}
